datasetName.title: Dataset Name
datasetName.description: The Name of the final table to replicate this file into (should include letters, numbers dash and underscores only).

format.title: File Format
format.description: The Format of the file which should be replicated (Warning: some formats may be experimental, please refer to the docs).

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL path to access the file which should be replicated.

provider.title: Storage Provider
provider.description: The storage Provider or Location of the file(s) which should be replicated.

service_account_json.title: Service Account JSON
service_account_json.description: In order to access private Buckets stored on Google Cloud, this connector would need a service account json credentials with the proper permissions as described here. Please generate the credentials.json file and copy/paste its content to this field (expecting JSON formats). If accessing publicly available data, this field is not necessary.

timeHeader.title: DateTime Header
timeHeader.description: The header field in the CSV which represents the date time for the event

timeFormat.title: DateTime Format
timeFormat.description: The format of the date time field. Eg :  yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS

timeZone.title: TimeZone
timeZone.description: Provide TimeZone in java TimeZone ID format incase timeZone not available in DataTime Header. Default UTC. Eg : US/Pacific US/Eastern UTC etc

backfillStartDateTime.title: Backfill Start Date Time
backfillStartDateTime.description: Backfill data from data time. Use the same DateTime Format

backfillEndDateTime.title: Backfill End Date Time
backfillEndDateTime.description: Backfill data to data time (Optional). Use the same DateTime Format

periodicity.title: Periodicity
periodicity.description: Periodicity of simulating the load. (In secs)

sleepTime.title: Sleep(ms)
sleepTime.description: Sleep time while simulating the load between ingestion requests. (In millis)

URL.title: URL
URL.description: The URL path to access the file which should be replicated.

provider.title: Storage Provider
provider.description: The storage Provider or Location of the file(s) which should be replicated.

service_account_json.title: Service Account JSON
service_account_json.description: In order to access private Buckets stored on Google Cloud, this connector would need a service account json credentials with the proper permissions as described here. Please generate the credentials.json file and copy/paste its content to this field (expecting JSON formats). If accessing publicly available data, this field is not necessary.

upload_id.title: Data
upload_id.description: Select a file containing data to be processed
